description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 233849FUL dated 02/02/2024 for: Creation of a community garden on land next to Norwood Bottom Lock, and new stepped and ramped accesses from the canal to Glade Lane Canalside Park, as part of the Grand Union Canal Wellbeing Way. Amendment seeks to regularise a change to the approved alignment of the proposed ramped path down to Glade Lane Canalside Park; removal of the hardstanding connection between the towpath and cycle shelter; retention of the existing concrete slab in front of the entrance
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):
11575-CRT-GU-214-003-24-D Rev P02 Site Block Plan; P11575-CRT-GU-215-015-DR-C-280 Rev P02 Lock 91
Community Garden - Construction Details Plan; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-29-C Rev P02 Site Location

Plan; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-30-C Towpath Detail; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-31-C Cycle Shelter; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-32-C Water Butt; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-33-C Veg Trug Planter; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-34-C Frond Pergola; 11575-CRT-GU-214-003-35-C Standard Planter; P11575-CRT-GU-215-015-DR-C-250 Rev P02 Lock 91 Community Garden - General Arrangement & Finishes Plan; P11575-CRT-GU-215-015-DR-C-260 Rev P02 Lock 91 Community Garden - Finished Levels Plan; P11575-CRT-GU-215-015-DR-C-270 Rev P02 Lock 91 Community Garden - Earthworks Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
site_name: Land North Of Norwood Bottom Lock (Lock 91), Grand Union Canal
